title: Consumer-Focused Prelude Growth Collects $250 Million for Second Fund
sub_head: The women-led firm invests in makers of consumer products for the ‘modern consumer’
body:
Prelude Growth Partners has raised $250 million for its latest fund, aiming to invest in companies whose products focus on what the private-equity firm calls the modern consumer, its founders said.
Prelude Growth Partners II LP is nearly triple the size of the consumer-focused firm’s first vehicle, which collected $85 million in February 2018.
